supplements.name: Whey protein
supplements.description: A supplement that provides protein for muscle growth and repair.
benefits: May help to promote muscle growth

supplements.name: Creatine
supplements.description: A supplement that can help to increase muscle mass and strength.
benefits: May help to increase muscle mass and strength
May improve performance during high-intensity exercise

supplements.name: Beta-alanine
supplements.description: A supplement that can help to reduce muscle fatigue during high-intensity exercise.
benefits: May reduce muscle fatigue during high-intensity exercise
May improve performance during short-duration, high-intensity exercise

supplements.name: Omega-3 fatty acids
supplements.description: A supplement that contains essential fatty acids important for brain function and heart health.
benefits: May reduce inflammation and risk of chronic diseases
May improve brain function and mental health
May help to lower blood pressure

supplements.name: Vitamin D
supplements.description: A supplement that is important for bone health and immune function.
benefits: May help to reduce risk of certain diseases
